title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9500.5 - Computation of interest payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9500.5 - Computation of interest payment

State Regulations
(a) Interest shall be paid for the period beginning on the day after the required
payment date and ending on the date on which payment is made. (b) Interest under this Part shall be
computed at the daily rate in effect on the day the interest is paid, as set by
the State Tax Commissioner for corporate taxes pursuant to section
1096 (e)(1)
of the Tax

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9500.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
